original_text: But I did not believe what they said until I came and saw with my own eyes. Indeed, not even half the greatness of your wisdom was told me; you have far exceeded the report I heard.
korean_text: 내가 그 말들을 믿지 아니하였더니 이제 와서 본즉 당신의 지혜가 크다 한 말이 그 절반도 못 되니 당신은 내가 들은 소문보다 더하도다

sentences.original_text: But I did not believe what they said
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 나는 그들이 말한 것을 믿지 않았다

sentences.original_text: until I came and saw with my own eyes
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 직접 와서 내 눈으로 보기까지는

sentences.original_text: not even half the greatness of your wisdom was told me
sentences.korean_translation: 당신의 지혜 위대함의 절반도 나에게 알려지지 않았다

sentences.original_text: you have far exceeded the report I heard
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 내가 들은 소문을 훨씬 뛰어넘었다
